I personally don't like the idea for stock. I'd rather spend my play time launching rockets than timewarping to the next launch.

If you had to wait, you'd be forced to do nothing/timewarp while doing nothing.

Basicly you'd be waiting more often than you'd be playing. Also it'd be impossible to plan launches. And what happends if you make a construction error and have to go back to the drawingboard? Timewarp through another 3 months to add 3 struts?

I realize there are a few people that want this, and that's exactly what mods are for. This has no reason to be in the stock game
